children.children: Thank You
Thank you for completing your details, we will be in touch as soon as possible.

Should you have any follow-up questions related to either our construction works or the Building Condition Inspections, please contact Surety Property team on 1300 767 741 or send an email to bbaybridge@suretyproperty.com.au
Property Details

The purpose of the survey is to record the current condition of your property before major construction activity begins. The survey will include an inspection and photographs of the inside and outside of any buildings, sheds, garages, fences and paths. Please provide the following details so that an inspection can be arranged.
{{label}}

By submitting your information to us, you are authorising us to gather information of the property owner, property owner's authorised representative and property's tenant details for the use towards organising the Building Inspection.
Building Condition Inspection
If you are the Owner or the Authorised Representative on behalf of the property owner and would like to accept proceeding with a Building Condition Inspection please hit the ACCEPT button.
If you are not an Authorised Representative/or a tenant please just close the page and no further action is required.
Thank you for your submission and providing all the necessary property contact details.
{{label}}
Property Address Confirmation
If this address is incorrect, please contact Surety Property team on 1300 767 741 or send an email to bbaybridge@suretyproperty.com.au so we can resolve this for you.
Web Verification Code
Please enter the 5 alphanumeric code provided in the letter you received. If your code contains 0, it is the number zero.
For assistance, please contact Surety Property team on 1300 767 741 or send an email to bbaybridge@suretyproperty.com.au.
The code entered is not recognised.
For assistance, please contact the Batemans Bay project team on 1800 870 119 or send an email to bbaybridge@suretyproperty.com.au.
Click here to try another property code.
You have declined assessment for your property
You have chosen to decline the offer of the Pre-Condition Assessment for your property. You may forfeit any opportunity to claim for damages related to these works.

Should you have any follow-up questions related to either our construction works or the Building Condition Inspections, please contact Surety Property team on 1300 767 741 or send an email to bbaybridge@suretyproperty.com.au.
